Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

DDK XMIDI Function: MDI_init

Discussion

Input:

Nothing

Output:

Nothing
All registers changed

Purpose:

Initializes common driver variables; performs far pointer fixups based on driver CS: value

Notes:

Must be called prior to any other MSS functions


Group: DDK Support Routines for XMIDI Sound Drivers
